climatePledgeFriendly.details: ENERGY STAR Most Efficient recognizes the best of ENERGY STAR certified products with highest efficiency and maximum carbon reductions.

features: BLUEAIR’S TOP-PERFORMING AIR PURIFIER LINE: Blue family’s new Pure Max series with our proprietary HEPASilent performance now even better with up to 83% faster cleaning and 50% less noise*
LET’S CLEAR THE AIR QUIETER: Quiet Mark certified (23-53dB); Cleans up to 1,524sqft XL space in 30min or 635sqft extra-large room in about 12.5min on high
LET’S CLEAR THE AIR FASTER: HEPASilent dual filtration technology delivers more clean air faster and uses less noise and energy than HEPA filtration alone**

LET’S CLEAR THE AIR BETTER: Removes at least 99.97% of tiny airborne particles like viruses and smoke down to 0.1 microns, and captures pet dander, pollen, mold allergen and dust; carbon filter traps light household odors from smoking, pets and cooking***

LET’S CLEAR THE AIR SMARTER: Blueair smart air purifier app scheduling, air quality monitoring, Clean Air ETA, Welcome Home geofencing and RealTrack accurate 6–9 month filter tracking technology are customizable features; Alexa voice control available

LET’S CLEAR THE AIR EASIER: Intuitive LED display, advanced pollution (PM1, PM2.5, PM10) sensor, real-time indoor readings, 5-color AQI and two-button design make it easy to control fan speed 1 – 4 including night mode, auto, brightness and child lock
BLUEAIR REPLACEMENT FILTER: Blue Pure 211i Max Genuine Replacement Filter; Blue Pure F2MAX B08KPHRLXR fits Blue Pure 211i Max Air Purifier and is designed for optimal performance

INDEPENDENTLY TESTED FOR PERFORMANCE & SAFETY, ZERO OZONE: AHAM Verifide for Performance (CADR); Quiet Mark Certified; Ozone Safety Standards Certified by CARB; Zero Ozone Verified (<5 ppb) by Intertek Sustainability
LET’S CLEAR THE AIR WITH LESS ENERGY: Energy Star Most Efficient 2023; Blueair air purifiers use less energy

LET’S CLEAR THE AIR WITH BLUEAIR: Our Blue Pure Max air purifier comes with one filter preinstalled and a pre-filter for easy set up; This product is made for NORTH AMERICA USE ONLY and should only be used with input voltages between 110-120V
body.description: Blue Pure 211i+ Max HEPASilent™ smart air purifier quickly cleans up to 1,524sqft XL space in 30min or 635sqft extra-large room in about 12.5min on high. Independently evaluated for safety standards and third-party tested for performance as part of the AHAM Verifide® Program for air cleaners, this air purifier has a Clean Air Delivery Rate (CADR) of 410 for fine smoke particles, dust and pollen. Get more out of the filter thanks to our proprietary RealTrack algorithm where fan speed, usage time and pollution levels are used to calculate exactly how dirty the filter is based on actual usage and tells you more accurately when to replace it within 9 months. Shop genuine Blueair Blue Pure F2MAX replacement filter for optimal performance: Blue Pure 211i Max air purifier replacement filter B08KPHRLXR. Blueair is the only line of air purifiers with a customizable, washable fabric pre-filter. Inspired by the latest Scandinavian design trend, Blue Pure Max air purifiers arrive in the Stockholm Fog pre-filter, while Limestone, Moss and Sand pre-filters are sold separately. *Comparing pollen CADR on high fan speed (Blue Pure 411a Max & 411i Max vs. Blue 411 Auto), other units may vary. Based on AHAM maximum allowable certified rating which may vary from the AHAM seal claimed valued. Noise refers to the dB(A) difference in acoustic power. **When similar CADR was measured, Blueair models with mechanical and electrostatic filtration achieved less noise with less energy than same models with only H13 HEPA mechanical filtration. ***Tested PM 2.5 (0.1 - 2.5 microns) up to 90min in a 30m3 room. Tested to remove min. 99.9% of S. aureus, K. pneumoniae, P. aeruginosa, MS2, E.Coli, H1N1, A.Niger.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So good we bought another!
reviews.reviewText: This is a game-changer! The sleek, modern design fits seamlessly into my home decor, and the built-in air quality monitor sets it apart from other purifiers.The real-time air quality display provides valuable insights into the pollutants present in the air, allowing me to monitor and adjust the purifier's settings accordingly. The HEPA filtration system effectively captures dust, allergens, and most importantly dog hair, resulting in a noticeable improvement in air quality.What impressed me the most is the purifier's adaptive mode, which automatically adjusts its fan speed based on the air quality data. This ensures that the air remains clean and fresh at all times, without the need for constant manual adjustments.Its super quiet allows me to enjoy purified air without any disruptive noise, and the programmable timer adds a layer of convenience to its usage. The filter replacement indicator is a helpful feature that ensures the purifier continues to perform optimally.After using this purifier for several months, I can confidently say that it has made a noticeable difference in the air quality within my home. I no longer have to worry about indoor air pollutants, thanks to this advanced air purifier.Blue air purifier has exceeded my expectations with its air quality monitoring capabilities and efficient purification technology. If you're looking for a purifier that goes above and beyond, I highly recommend giving this one a try!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quiet yet efficiaent
reviews.reviewText: I bought several for the house and they work great. I actually use the phone app a lot. Much easier to set controls through that than manually. Sleep more works great too. App tells you your air quality and how much filtering capacity it has left. Some rooms will go more than a year before they need filter replacement, other busier rooms around 9 months

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very quite and unobtrusive.
reviews.reviewText: Such a nice upgrade in looks, performance and very quiet operation. The price is right too. Would not connected to my 2.4G wifi or app being the only downside. Not a problem at all, imo it functions great without it. Auto and blackout mode is so fantastic. Set it up and forget about it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Attractive, quiet, but not true HEPA
reviews.reviewText: I needed to set up a filter in my home office once I started sharing it with a parakeet, and decided to go for this model, as offering a good combination of size, appearance, and functionality. I also splurged on the 411i (internet connected) just to try it out.I'm surprised at how much I'm enjoying the connectivity. Not that I NEED to be able to adjust fan speed from a thousand miles away, but I could!! More importantly, this gives me the ability to program a schedule - lower fan speed when I'm working, higher in the evenings / weekends. It also lets me set intermediate fan speeds, e.g. 2.5 versus 3, or whatever.Noise: I have it set to 1 during the day, and I genuinely do not notice it unless I deliberately listen for it. When I'm in the office later, it is louder - but it's just white noise, so it's not bothersome. And my allergies do seem to be slightly better.HEPA filtration: The manufacturer uses the term HEPASilent, not true HEPA. Doing some further reading, this is because the unit's filter is NOT a true HEPA filter, which by itself traps 99.7% of particles of 0.3 microns (and supposedly, even more for larger or smaller particles). Instead, this unit combines a barrier filter with an electrostatic unit - presumably this is responsible for the low noise level and the energy efficiency. Having used true HEPA units in the pasts, the BlueAir unit is definitely quieter.Because of the electrostatic component, the device will emit a small amount of ozone. As it falls within all regulatory limits, including California's tough rules, this seems to be low enough that it is not worrisome. If you are particularly concerned over ozone, and/or plant to use this in a closed room without adequate ventilation, it's something to consider.A note on the filtration efficiency: BlueAir claims that their unit removes 99.7% of particles 0.1 microns in size - which would seem to be even better than the HEPA standard. However, since the HEPA standard says that they will likely trap MORE particles larger and smaller than 0.3 microns, it is certainly possible that the BlueAir doesn't work quite as well. I don't know if that's the case, and I suspect that for household uses, it would not make any difference for practical purposes - the difference would be trivial.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The best air cleaner you can buy!
reviews.reviewText: These are the quietest air purifiers I have ever purchased. Very easy set up. Turn it on and let it run. There has been a noticeable difference in the air quality in our house. It takes out odors quickly and there is much less dust on our hardwood floors. The bluetooth and app are very handy to check filter condition and turn power off and on. You will not be disappointed with this purchase.

I have this in my bedroom & use it for hobby work also. You can control the fan speed either directly on the unit or on your smartphone; the app tells you the air quality via quality of the filter. I also use an activated carbon cover on my resin curer just in case it’s needed. This is a quiet and functional unit, though large, I have more confidence that it’s doing its job and has a long filter life.

This is a great product. It's super quiet in the low fan setting and even at a high speed the sound is minimal. It's a light unit to move around which comes in handy. So moving to the main floor when it got a little smokey from burning some food was easy and it cleared out the smell and smoke in no time.

reviews.reviewTitle: Good but contamination sensors should be improved.
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. It works well. The price is hight and filter too. I like that it is wifi. I like too that I can control it via smart plug (on/off) and do routine, contrary to my old serie 500/600 that has remote control and it is impossible (Attention: i love my old 500/600 that I have for many years and I am happy with). Hoping the quality has not changed with the time. It is quiet and I like the concept capturing circularly contamination and pushing clean air only vertically on top. All around fabric cover could be easily washing.I am concerned about the set point when it is in automatic mode. In 3 weeks of use, I never saw changing from automatic mode to hight speed clean air. I think the sensor are very bad contrary to serie 500/600 that easily detect smell, contamination and quickly pass from automatic mode to hight speed clean. That could be improved seriously.Finally , I saw purifier increase speed at higher level when the numbers on screen at PM2.5 reached higher that 36.Led light in front of device changes colour: 0-12 blue, 12-22 green, 22-32 yellow, higher than 33 red and speed increase.

Bought for my condo to help with smell of cigarette smoke coming from my neighbor. Seems to eliminate odours well. Unit is not too loud except on the max setting- even then it is fine if you have the tv on or like white noise. It’s light enough to move from room so I bring it to my bedroom every night. I love the app so you can see percentage of filter use, and that you can set a schedule! I run it higher nightly when I relax in the living room. So handy. Highly recommend.

We bought this because my daughter-in-law is highly allergic to our cats. We put this in the bedroom where she and my son sleep when they visit and my daughter-in-law feels that it helped with her allergies. It is not silent but is fairly quiet. She said that it did not interrupt her sleep at all. She said she liked the gentle "white noise" it provided.
